title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 36 - State Standard Building Code For Places Of Public Assembly
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 36 - State Standard Building Code For Places Of Public Assembly

State Regulations

Subpart 36-1 - General Provisions (§ 36-1.1 to 36-1.6)

Subpart 36-2 - Requirements Of General Application (§ 36-2.1 to 36-2.10)

Subpart 36-3 - Special Requirements For Particular Occupancies (§ 36-3.1 to 36-3.8)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 36

Statutory authority: Labor Law, §§27, 27-a, 200, 470, 471, 472, 473, 474, 474-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
